item.title: Psychedelic Ayahuasca Moves into the Mainstream
item.description:
Psychedelic Ayahuasca Moves into the Mainstream

I grew up with Matt. We went to grade school and high school together - we've been friends for some 27 years. He was always ahead of the curve on drugs. When we were in seventh grade we went to the Eagles' Hell Freezes Over tour: Matt was happily hitting up people our parents' age for tokes as I innocently buried my nose beneath my sweatshirt.

item.title: For me, ayahuasca was as good as therapy. Here's what the science says.
item.description:
For me, ayahuasca was as good as therapy. Here's what the science says.

It was a weird place. The landscape was perfectly flat and seemed to stretch for thousands of miles in every direction. There were no trees, not a blade of grass, and the air was dry. But it wasn't a dead place. The sky was something else.

item.title: Pablo Amaringo - Art, Prints, Posters, Home Decor, Greeting Cards, and Apparel
item.description:
Pablo Amaringo - Art, Prints, Posters, Home Decor, Greeting Cards, and Apparel

Browse through Pablo Amaringo's online art portfolio. Each image can be purchased as a canvas print, framed print, greeting card, phone case, and more. Recognized as one of the worlds great visionary artists, Pablo Amaringo was renowned for his intricate, colorful paintings inspired by his shamanic visions.

item.title: This Hebrew Professor Claims The Bible's Moses Was On DMT
item.description:
This Hebrew Professor Claims The Bible's Moses Was On DMT

According to Professor Benny Shanon at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem , it's likely that Moses' encounter, as written in the Bible, with the burning bush and his conversation with Yahweh happened while he was under the influence of DMT. "It seems logical that something was altered in people's consciousness.

item.title: Deep Dreaming Fear & Loathing in Las Vegas: the Great San Francisco Acid Wave
item.description:
Deep Dreaming Fear & Loathing in Las Vegas: the Great San Francisco Acid Wave

item.title: Ayahuasca Dreams & Shamanism - Terence McKenna: The Last Word
item.description:
Ayahuasca Dreams & Shamanism - Terence McKenna: The Last Word

Ayahuasca Dreams & Shamanism - Terence McKenna: The Last Word. This film is dedicated to the work and play of Terrence McKenna, on the fractal edge of time, 1946 - 2000. For more information on this topic we recommend the film #U670 Shamans of the Amazon - 3 DVD Special Edition now available on DVD at www.UFOTV.com.
